name: Root
arguments: { "service_now_tables" : { "inputType" : "prompt", "schema" : { "type" : "array", "default" : ["cmdb_ci_database"] }, "required" : true, "sensitive" : false, "contextVariable" : false, "alwaysPrompt" : false }, "service_now_limit" : { "inputType" : "prompt", "schema" : { "type" : "number", "description" : "Limit for how many tickets to retrieve", "default" : 1000 }, "required" : false, "sensitive" : false, "contextVariable" : false, "alwaysPrompt" : false }, "service_now_asset_id" : { "inputType" : "prompt", "schema" : { "type" : "string" }, "required" : true, "sensitive" : false, "contextVariable" : false, "alwaysPrompt" : false }, "mx_dataset_name" : { "inputType" : "prompt", "schema" : { "type" : "string", "default" : "service_now_cmdb" }, "required" : true, "sensitive" : false, "contextVariable" : false, "alwaysPrompt" : false } }

name: ServiceNow CMDB Enrichment
arguments: { "root#tables" : { "inputType" : "bind", "schema" : { "type" : "array", "default" : ["cmdb_ci_database"] }, "required" : true, "sensitive" : false, "runAsProject" : false, "expression" : "\"$root.arguments.service_now_tables\"" }, "root#limit" : { "inputType" : "bind", "schema" : { "type" : "number", "description" : "Limit for how many tickets to retrieve", "default" : 1000 }, "required" : false, "sensitive" : false, "runAsProject" : false, "expression" : "\"$root.arguments.service_now_limit\"" }, "root#service_now_asset_id" : { "inputType" : "bind", "schema" : { }, "required" : true, "sensitive" : false, "runAsProject" : false, "expression" : "\"$root.arguments.service_now_asset_id\"" } }

name: Send ServiceNow CMDB Data to MX
